description:
Finally the decisive battle begins between Koi Koi Seven and the Gokoh Academy Club.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Gorgeous Party!? Miya Explodes! The Sandstorm of Cattleya Castle
Shuchinikurin!? Miya-sama Sakuretsu! Suna no Arashi no Cattleya Jou Desu
酒池肉林!? ミヤ様炸裂! 砂の嵐のカトレア城です~
